hero.title: Build bold 2D worlds with Nostalgi2D
hero.subtitle: A TypeScript-first, multiplayer-ready 2D engine for speed, clarity and creative flow. From prototypes to persistent worlds — ship faster with an authoritative server model and ergonomic APIs.

features.title: Performance
features.description: Deterministic loops, zero-GC hot paths, and smart culling keep your frame times razor sharp.

features.title: Modularity
features.description: Composable systems with clean boundaries — opt-in physics, rendering, input, and netcode modules.

features.title: Multiplayer
features.description: Authoritative server, client prediction, and rollback-ready state replication out of the box.

pitch.title: Why Nostalgi2D?
columns: TypeScript-first APIs with strong typing across server and client.
Pluggable ECS that stays out of your way until you need it.
Asset-light build pipeline; hot reload where it matters.
Authoritative netcode with prediction hooks and reconciliation helpers.
Deterministic simulation options for competitive modes.
Headless server support; spin up bots for load and QA.
Batteries-included docs, tutorials, and API references.
Modular: pick rendering (Pixi/Three/Canvas) without rewiring core.
Friendly ergonomics with escape hatches for experts.
